name: Heart of China
description:
Heart of China is an adventure game developed by Dynamix. It was originally released in 1990. It was published by Sierra On-Line. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Heart of China on Commodore / Amiga, Classic Macintosh and PC. The game is sold via GOG.
Jeffrey Tunnell directed the game. It was scored by Christopher Stevens and Don Latarski.
